name: Vitale #42
description: Your 1.00 carat pear brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its IF clarity, internally flawless, is combined with an exceptional white D colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. The combination of IF clarity and D colour is extremely rare and highly coveted, positioning your diamond among the most exclusive and elite in the diamond market. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
